---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
data_file1 <- read.csv("..//csvData/csvData1/Sample1/A01_AfterIncubation_d1000_S1,4.fcs.csv")
data_file1
```

Normalization

```{r}
z_data <- sapply(data_file1, function(x) (x - mean(x)) / sd(x))
as.data.frame(z_data)
```

creating pca

```{r}
pca.data <- prcomp(z_data, center = TRUE, scale. = TRUE)
pca.data
```

Creating csv file:
```{r}
write.csv(z_data, "z_normalized_data_sample1.1.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```
